EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Executive Luncheon with Ian Andrews on Wednesday, February 17, 2016. Please see event details below.
Date: February 17, 2016 Time: 12:00 PM Location: Flemings Restaurant <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir/]]>, 9200 Stony Point Pkwy, Richmond, VA 23235
{{my.Save the date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website.
